metadata.title: 1Pack Spring Twist Colors Braiding Hair 8inch Bomb Twist Crochet Ombre Colors Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions Low Temperature Fiber 30 Strands 110g/Pack(1B/30)
description: 1.Is the hair itchy?Answer:It wasn't itchy the hair is soft and bouncy.2.Is the hair pre-twisted?Answer:Yes,The spring twist hair is pre-twisted.3.Can this hair get wet?Answer:It's fine getting wet. It won't change its shape or texture.They only thing that matters is the temperature of the water you're wetting it with. Hot water will, of course, change it.Also the drying time may vary based on humidity and weather or not you plan to use a hair dryer.4.Why choose our spring twist crochet hair?Answer:Strict quality control, very easy to install, the hair feels very soft and comfortable,Suggestion:When Wearing Spring Twist Hair To Sleep, It Is Recommended That You Bring a Nightcap To Better.Protect Your Hair And Extend The Use Ti About Separate:Every Thread Intertwined Together In Every Strand Makes Strands Strong And More Elastic Effect,Resulting In Hard Or Time- Consuming To Separated.
